How to Use This App
Step 1: Enter Soil Parameters
Enter your soil\'s NPK values and pH level. You can get these from a soil testing kit or laboratory analysis.
Step 2: Weather Data
Click \"Fetch Weather Data\" to automatically get current weather conditions, or enter them manually.
Step 3: Get Prediction
Click \"Predict Crop\" to get AI-powered recommendations for the best crops to grow in your conditions.
